ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.9 on 2024-07-27T21:28:26 [Issue ID 4000-125312] urn:comicvine:4000-125312
ComicInfo.Summary:
Historic 100th issue of 2000AD. After being left hanging after part nine (prog 84), Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter is back for the concluding run of his first story - Verdus. Dan Dare returns, picking up from the cliff-hanger at the end of prog 85 (written by Tom Tully, who would go on to write DD in the relaunched Eagle). Also this prog, the start of a four-part collectable Judge Dredd poster in the colour centre-spread.
Cover: Ian Gibson (Robo-Hunter)
Ro-Busters - The Terra-Meks! (part 3) (Pat Mills - Dave Gibbons)Judge Dredd - The Day the Law Died (part 12) (John Wagner - Mick McMahon - Tom Frame)Judge Dredd Mega-City Hyper-Cop poster (part 1 of 4) (art: Mick McMahon)Sam Slade: Robo-Hunter - Verdus (part 10) (John Wagner - Ian Gibson - Steve Potter)Dan Dare - Servant of Evil! (part 1) (Tom Tully - Dave Gibbons)
